blood.author: denny
blood.post: Why am I reminded of people who see Noah’s Ark in a fuzzy aerial photos of Mt. Ararat in Eastern Turkey? It is almost certainly cognitive bias on CB’s part, an essential part of his elaborate conspiracy theory and pseudoscientific claim that the shroud is of a roasted Jacques De Molay. I do, however, enjoy reading about it in his rambling, multi day postings..
blood.title: That is not what one would expect to see if the blood-first dogma were true.
